_description: TED Capability Maturity Model â€” 5 levels (0=Not Present, 1=Basic, 2=Functional, 3=Governed, 4=Self-Improving). Re-evaluated each council cycle.

dimensions.name: email_handling
dimensions.notes: Governed: ingestion, triage, draft generation, send via Graph. Missing: semantic search across email history.

dimensions.name: calendar_awareness
dimensions.notes: Governed: read events with attendees/body, meeting prep/debrief, enriched normalization. Target met.

dimensions.name: task_management
dimensions.notes: Governed: GTD actions, waiting-for, Planner/To Do sync, reconciliation. Missing: auto-prioritization based on context.

dimensions.name: deal_tracking
dimensions.notes: Governed: deal pipeline, stage management, stale owner tracking, retrospective, auto-brief. Target met.

dimensions.name: document_management
dimensions.notes: Governed: SharePoint browse/search/upload now backed by document connector quality policy + friction evidence. Missing: extraction and intelligence layers.

dimensions.name: governance_safety
dimensions.notes: Self-Improving: Builder Lane proposes governance changes, rubber-stamping detection, constitution check. Target met.

dimensions.name: self_healing
dimensions.notes: Self-Improving: circuit breakers, provider health, config drift, zombie drafts, noise reduction, dynamic autonomy. Target met.

dimensions.name: personalization
dimensions.notes: Governed: style guide, draft style, correction signals, cold-start archetypes, voice extraction. Missing: per-context style adaptation.

dimensions.name: knowledge_retrieval
dimensions.notes: Governed: retrieval scope/query/security contracts plus replay-gated containment are implemented; semantic/vector ranking remains optional future enhancement.

dimensions.name: multi_user
dimensions.notes: Not Present: single operator only. Architectural planning needed but not urgent for current use case.

dimensions.name: evaluation_pipeline
dimensions.notes: Governed: policy thresholds now define pass-rate, canary failure budget, and drift alert limits. Next step: self-optimizing remediation loops.

dimensions.name: non_destructive_evolution
dimensions.notes: Basic: config drift reconciliation exists but no schema versioning, no migration runner, no upcasters.
